tr.td:
Varunkumar Nagarajan, the author of this blog, is a Software Engineer from Hyderabad. Varun completed his Five Years Integrated M.Sc (Software Engineering) programme from P.S.G. College of Technology, Coimbatore. He has worked for Intel Technology India Pvt. Ltd. and Interchain Solutions as an intern. A programmer by choice. He loves programming and started blogging on Aug-2006. From then, he became socially active on internet.
Other than programming, Varun is very much passionate about cricket. A die-hard fan of Rahul Dravid. His hobbies include creating flash animations, developing games, etc.
Contact Varun
